attributes.action: ban the use of the union jack for any political party logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: parties such as the BNP have hijacked the union jack as their logo and as a result I  think of them whenever I see our flag. this is rubbish - I want to feel proud when I see the flag of my country, not ashamed! why not stop them becoming 'martyrs of free speech and patriotism' by making it illegal for any party to use the flag in their logo? that way they do not call upon our emotions and our national pride and instead look even more daft than they do already?
